snippet: Saeed Abedini, the Iranian-American pastor serving an eight-year prison term in Iran on charges of undermining national security, could face additional charges.
abstract: Wife of pastor Saeed Abedini, Iranian-American political prisoner serving eight-year term in Iran, says he could face more charges; expresses hope he and three other prisoners might be released in wake of Iran nuclear accord, given that Iranian officials have hinted at possible prisoner swap.
lead_paragraph: Saeed Abedini, the Iranian-American pastor serving an eight-year prison term in Iran on charges of undermining national security, could face additional charges.

headline.main: Iran: U.S. Detainee May Face More Charges
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Iran: Detainee May Face More Charges
